metadata.dc:title: Compartment syndrome following snakebite
metadata.dc:description: We present the case of a 12-year-old boy who, during a stay at a summer camp, received a snakebite that triggered severe compartment síndrome(AU)
metadata.dc:creator: Peláez, D
Gómez Campderá, J. A
Riquelme, O
metadata.dc:description: Presentamos el caso de un niño de 12 años de edad que, estando en un campamento de verano, sufre una mordedura de víbora que le desencadena un síndrome compartimental grave(AU)
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome compartimental tras una mordedura de víbora
